title: Three arrested over attempt to incite violence over social media
body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st); Police have arrested three on suspicion of inciting violence via social media today (19).

Accordingly, a 22-year old resident of Dikwella has been arrested over attempts to incite violence via urging the public to set fire to houses owned by Police and the Tri-Forces, a 21- year old resident of Nugegoda over attempts to incite violence over Social Media, and a 39-year old Narahenpita resident.
Further investigations will be conducted under the Computer Crimes Act, Police added.
